actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-552, by Mr. Linder.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 182.

official_title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee of Rules.

summary.text: Waives the requirement under rule XIII of the House of Representatives of a two-thirds vote to consider a Committee on Rules report on the same day it is presented to the House, with respect to any resolution reported by such Committee on June 27, 2002, providing for consideration or disposition of H.R. 4954 (Medicare modernization and prescription drug benefit).

titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee of Rules.
